name: Social-wombat
body:
##Java based Social Wombat?

This is a demo of how to create a secure console based java application that serves as a social networking system. Think of piazza but java console based! Encryption is done by password based 128 bit AES encryption. The exact protocol authentication protocol between a client and the service is described in the repository.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
